import { Avatar } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import '../post.css' import ThumbUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ThumbUp'; import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ChatBubbleOutline'; import TelegramIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Telegram'; import MoreVertRoundedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVertRounded'; export default function Post({profilPicture, image ,userName,timeStamp,message}) { return ( <>

{userName}

{new Date(timeStamp).toUTCString()}

{message}

Like

Comment

Share

) }
